Package uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.xml

Classes used to implement XML editing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DomVisitor  
    InfoProvider  
    XMLTarget
    Interface representing the target of XML edit transitions This represents both the Document being edited and a target position in that document.
    XMLTargetFactory
    Interface to locate an XMLTarget based on a location path.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDomVisitor  
    AbstractXMLTarget
    Default implementation of XMLTarget
    DomTransitionProvider
    a PathTransitionProvider for editing XML documents.
    DomTransitionProvider.DeleteTransition  
    DomTransitionProvider.DownLoadTransition  
    DomTransitionProvider.EditAction  
    DomTransitionProvider.EditNodeAction  
    DomTransitionProvider.EditNodeTransition  
    DomTransitionProvider.EditTransition  
    DomTransitionProvider.HasParentKey  
    DomTransitionProvider.ParentTransition  
    DomWalker
    This Class is responsible to building location paths to identify XML node.
    LocatorDomVisitor
    A DomVisitor that locates a target Node in the Document being walked using a location path.
    NodeInput
    A Text input for XML nodes.
    ViewDomVisitor
    A DomVisitor that generates a clickable.
    ViewXMLTargetResult  
    XMLDocumentInput
    A Text input for XML nodes.
    XMLKey  

Package uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.xml Description

Classes used to implement XML editing. It uses a similar pattern to the Email editing classes but implemented via a PathTransitionProvider.
